freedom is non-negotiable

uplifting blackness under police jurisdiction.
dainsaint.com/freedom-is-non-negotiable/

Project Status

Active. Interested in contributing words or art?

within the protests that erupted in the wake of the state-sanctioned murders of george floyd, breonna taylor, and tony mcdade, i felt the need to process my grief.

 

contents

the oleaster in bloom
onyx on the workshop floor
stereotypography
forty percent off
19 Jun
2020

the oleaster in bloom

when the news reached galveston
the last to hear
closed her eyes
dreamed of us

and smiled

15 Jun
2020

onyx on the workshop floor

the first mold she had to
break
was her own

could you imagine
break
ing your ribs
so your heart could be
free

31 May
2020

stereotypography

we stand with our hands up
and they hollow out our bellies
with bullets
leaving only a hashtag behind

29 May
2020

forty percent off

you once said we were worth
three-fifths
oh to be worth
that much
to you
